item.title: 关于
item.description:
About

My name is Brian Lv(CN:吕海峰). You can call me Brian.I am an algorithm engineer(AI),and a strong advocate and believer of Free Software. I love Machine/Deep Learning,Data Science,HPC and Cloud Computing.Now,I focus on image video algorithm. In spare time,I like reading,climbing mountain and photography.

Work Experience

  • MeiYou(Web Site) as an algorithm expert(AI).
  • IFENG GROUP(Web Site) as a senior algorithm engineer(Machine/Deep Learning).
  • GOME HOLDINGS GROUP(Web Site) as a R&D Manager.
  • Moji Weather(Web Site) as a Senior Data Engineer.
